channel.title: CVE Feed for ironikus -- Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses and Phone Numbers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ironikus -- Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses and Phone Numbers

item.title: CVE-2023-7070|2024-08-02T08:50:07.873Z -- ironikus -- email%20encoder%20%E2%80%93%20protect%20email%20addresses%20and%20phone%20numbers
item.description: The Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses and Phone Numbers plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's eeb_mailto shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.9 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2023-4599|2024-08-02T07:31:06.520Z -- ironikus -- email%20encoder%20%E2%80%93%20protect%20email%20addresses%20and%20phone%20numbers
item.description: The Slimstat Analytics plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'eeb_mailto' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 2.1.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1282|2024-06-04T17:59:23.566Z -- ironikus -- email%20encoder%20%E2%80%93%20protect%20email%20addresses%20and%20phone%20numbers
item.description: The Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses and Phone Numbers plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode(s) in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1282|2024-08-01T18:33:25.519Z -- ironikus -- email%20encoder%20%E2%80%93%20protect%20email%20addresses%20and%20phone%20numbers
item.description: The Email Encoder – Protect Email Addresses and Phone Numbers plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode(s) in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
